channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 11:15 Failure to alarm to the Chernihiv region. Since further reports.
item.description: 🟢 11:15 Failure to alarm to the Chernihiv region. Since further reports.#Chernihiv_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
